website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated cat mat traps litter in bottom layer, reducing tracking. We recommend a puppy pad to absorb urine effectively.
pros: Litter falls between large pores, not just fibers
cons: Cat pee can permeate plastic layer
Persistent urine odor difficult to eliminate

customer_reviews.title: My litterbox is in my main living area (so litter ...
customer_reviews.text: My litterbox is in my main living area (so litter is tracked everywhere) &I have a cat that occasionally (90% of the time) pees with her tail outside of the litterbox. This mat takes care of both issues!
customer_reviews.author: B. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF/LEAK-PROOF
customer_reviews.text: Despite what this says...it is NOT water proof. I had it on linoleum flooring in my bathroom...I ended up with cat urine soaking all the way through into the linoleum. My cat must’ve urinated outside of the box ONCE and kept going back. I originally liked it because it was easy to clean ) along with pouring the litter off every other day, i would also completely wash it about once every other week. I’m not sure if there was some “waterproof” coating or something that I ended up washing off, but this caused an epic disgusting disaster with my flooring!!!! There are other reviews that state the same thing, so it can’t just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome. I have hardwood floors upstairs and have two ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. I have hardwood floors upstairs and have two litterboxes up there. I was sweeping or vacuuming every single day to keep up with the trail of litter from my 4 cats. I got two of these litter mats when I was at my wits end with cleaning up litter in hopes that it would save me some time. Well, I've had them for about a week and haven't needed to vacuum up litter once! I honestly can't believe it. It's awesome!!!! Highly recommend! UPDATE: I loved them so much, I ordered another set. I cannot tell u how happy I am to not need to vacuum up litter everyday. One happy cat owner.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Amari

customer_reviews.title: Ugh a $40 Litter Mat... But I See the Light!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. I was hesitant to spend $40 on a stupid litter mat. Seriously, the litter box cost less than this thing! I can buy 42 pounds of litter for $12. Alas... I purchased it and it has cut down TREMENDOUSLY, I mean tremendously on the amount of litter my cat tracks through the house and onto the floor. It is insane. My big 18 pound man brings a lot of litter jumping back through his car door, and the holes on this may just take care of it so easily. And it looks really nice and is of extremely high quality. It is a large mat as well. I am an absolute believer of the $40 litter mat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: This mat is nice and does collect the litter, but I didn't realize that the size of it is too small to catch all the litter that is tracked outside of the box. It was too expensive to buy another, so I invested in a cheap vacuum for the excess that flies around.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A cat litter mat that works
customer_reviews.text: Tried so many cat litter mats and rugs and my cat managed to fling litter every where. She jumps from the litter box, attempting to bypass any mat or rug we have placed and the litter flies in all directions, bouncing off both rugs and mats. This mat captures the litter in small holes so the litter can not bounce and roll as she leaps, cutting down on mess. Also it is easy to dump the trapped litter into the garbage on changing days since the part with the holes lifts up so that the flat mat portion can dumped into a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jen&Phil

customer_reviews.title: Update! Once your pet has an accident on it, the smell is impossible to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: No longer recommend unless you don’t mind replacing it every time your cat has an accident. Whatever material they are using for the top unfortunately absorbs just enough urine to stink permanently, and no enzymatic cleaner is able to remove it. Old review: The large holes really do the trick and keep the litter scatter around my cat’s box to a minimum. Love the fact that the layers are easy to separate and can even hold a puppy pad to help with occasional accidents. Overall, effective and seems like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: kd78

customer_reviews.title: I tried all kinds of cat urine cleaners and the plastic still smells like urine/ way too pricey
customer_reviews.text: This mat claims to have urine - fighting abilities.. Wrong. I tried all kinds of cat urine cleaners and the plastic still smells like urine/ way too pricey. It's in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: TND52

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: It helps. It's a bit pricy. It really stinks when you 1st get it. It cuts down a little but unless you buy 2 or 3 you probably still have problems. But with the price and the looks less it's in the garage it's one of those rather sweep than have the look 3 of those would take up to have it be fully effective. Yes, even with the XL and just 1 cat and 1 litter box you'll need 2 or 3 of the matts unless you have a dainty princess of a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bertinazzi

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this mat makes! I have two cats, and one likes to scamper around in the litter box for fun (don't ask...) and tosses litter out of the box in superb fashion. I've used this mat for only a few days, and already drained out the litter once from it. It has caught everything! No litter elsewhere on the floor, and draining it out was super quick and easy. This is a game changer for me, with these two very messy cats.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: great at trapping litter
customer_reviews.text: This works great at trapping litter - there's a lot less that ends up throughout the house since using this and whatever gets kicked out of the box is easily funneled back into it. I also like that (thanks to an elderly cat who sometimes has 'accidents') I can put pee pads between the two layers to trap messes, and then wash the mat clean when needed. It's a big size, which means a huge area to cover, another plus.
customer_reviews.author: nekojita

customer_reviews.title: catches litter well, but absorbs urine
customer_reviews.text: Thus far this has been a really good mat. It traps scattered litter really well, and is quite easy to clean off. I keep a puppy pad underneath the top flap to catch overspray/inappropriate peeing and that actually makes the cleanup even easier. I like it enough that I am going to buy more for my other boxes. Update 3/19/2017: unfortunately I am demoting this to 3 stars because I had to get rid of them. The litter trapping aspect works really well, but the foam top absorbs urine and once that happens there is no getting rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Saves me a lot of sweeping...
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me a ton of 'sweeping of the cat liter' time more times than I can count. My cats don't seem to be bothered by this (and we know how finicky cats can be (lol)) sitting near & slightly under their litter box. It does a fantastic job collecting litter off of their paws, it is easy to change the pads within the unit and it is well made. This has helped my cats and I so much that I went ahead and bought a second one for their other box. I cannot begin to explain how much I am enjoying not having to sweep around the liter box multiple times a day. (:
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I must have the messiest cats around -- no matter what I used, there was always litter alongside the mat, and tracking thru the rooms. This mat is wonderful. It holds anything they manage to kick out and is very easy to lift and shake back into the box when cleaning. Well worth the money. And, they don't seem to want to eat it, as they have on others I've had. No idea why that is, but they seem to like plastic. This is not.
customer_reviews.author: Lunggislanda.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I originally had it at five stars for its use at catching litter, but realistically? More like a 3.5-4. Depends on the shape of your litter box. Anyway, I came to change the 5 star rating because my cat peed on it recently (I've had it for almost 10 months) and it reeks of ammonia. Even after washing it with special urine-cleaning products, bleach, sodium bicarbonate, etc. I tried to put it down again, but it just got peed on again. It's not worth $35. Maybe more like $20-25. I would buy it again for litter-catching purposes but not if you've got a urinating outside-of-the-litter-box cat!
customer_reviews.author: CS_2003

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases!!!!!!! Has changed my world!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product!!!!! Leo at (8 weeks) came to his forever home in August 2019, EVERYTHING was in place when he got here, in now 5 months, I have yet to walk on splattered cat litter on the floor!!!!! My biggest pet peeve is walking on scattered kitty litter, this helps soooo much, it collects all the litter, pickup and dump...so simple stupid, I wish I had these years ago for my other cats!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a much smaller and less effective pad from another manufacturer. This mat is much larger and covers a better area. I have two cats and they track litter throughout the house. I will write an update in a few weeks but this is the size that I wanted. It opens up so that you can shake it out when you bring it outside. Update: Amazed at how it is keeping the cat litter off of my hardwood floors. Well exceeds my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.author: SAT1963

customer_reviews.title: retains odors - my room never smelt so bad
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap - while this really does work to stop litter from spreading, this thing retains cat urine odor like nothing I've ever used before. I've used bath mats, small rugs, etc for cat to step on getting out of her box - nothing retained the odors like this. I tried to wash with hot water and soap, but couldn't get the stench out. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Megabit

customer_reviews.title: I wish I’d bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. One has a health problem that causes him a lack of consistent control of his rear legs. He kicks and tracks litter pretty consistently, but this mat does a good job of collecting that excess. He sort of wipes his paws on it. It has made a big difference in keeping the area around the litter enclosure relatively litter free. I open and shake the mat daily into the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McW

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This thing really does reduce the litter scatter. At least I think it does. There is still a small amount that it didn't catch but I don't think you can expect anything to perfectly catch every piece of it. There is certainly noticeably less litter scatter around the cat area than before I bought this and put it out. I definitely recommend this item for unwilling but somehow accidentally became cat owners like me who hate the litter box and the stupid litter that scatters all around.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! One of my two cats used to have a bad habit of using the restroom on her litter box mat and scratching it to shreds. This this is durable and thick, my cat cant destroy it as she has other mats. I love that you can put puppy pads in it too! My pain in the butt cat has gotten alot better about her bad habit but it still makes me feel better to put the pads in the mat, she cant get to them to shred them up and when she does have an "accident" I can easily throw out the pad and rinse the mat. I really do like this product.
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Just a small hang-up
customer_reviews.text: great product and good quality material. A big problem I'm having, though, is that as soon as even a little bit of litter is trapped under the first layer, my cats interpret it as an extension of the litter box. They keep peeing and pooping ON the mat, sometimes not bothering with the litter box at all. Luckily, it's fast and easy to clean. You just got to make sure you empty the excess litter frequently to discourage cats from getting confused.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat so far
customer_reviews.text: Having two cats that just love to fill my house with litter four paws full at a time, I've tried several mats. Well, my personal experience with this matter is great. Complete turn around from what was to how things are now. No more fearing of walking barefoot in my home. No more seeing litter on my coffee table and couch. I'm honestly amazed at how much of a difference this mat had made. Now if I can only figure out a way to make them stop shedding and puking...
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mats
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome litter mats! I have 2 at 2 litter boxes that I also purchased here on Amazon. We have 3 cats.. I was originally looking at a mat similar to this but much more expensive. I saw these as well and they appeared to have just as great reviews so I figured I’d give them a whirl! Glad I did! We’ve had them for a week and have had zero tracking into our tile or bamboo floors!! Now we aren’t having to sweep 3-4 times a day! Woohooo and these saved me about $30 for the 2 compared to the other mat I was looking at. Five stars all around!!
customer_reviews.author: CatMama05

customer_reviews.title: So much better then cloth mats and rugs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second iPrimio litter trapper mat. I have 2 litter boxes so bought one from iPrimio to go under a litter box and a rug from another company to go under the other. My cat threw up on the rug, I tried to wash it and it was just a disaster. Plus it didn't do a good job of trapping litter anyway. I ended up throwing the rug away and purchasing a second iPrimio. iPrimio is easy to clean and does a much better job of trapping litter my cats invariably track out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This litter mat has been an absolute lifesaver! I've bought many different kinds for our 2 cats, but the litter still goes everywhere. They track it from the closet their litter boxes are in, to the mudroom, and to the main living area. It's awful to have to clean that up so often. With these mats, it's 99% less tracked litter. These things are a godsend. I have one in front of each litter box and it's sufficient. BUY THESE IMMEDIATELY!!! They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lerns

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, works with crystal litter.
customer_reviews.text: This immediately cut the litter all over our floor down by about 85-90%. We use crystal litter, and it's too big for the holes on other mats. Instead of picking it up and emptying it, I usually just run the vacuum over it every second day. I'd highly recommend this mat if scattered litter has been driving you crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderwoman

customer_reviews.title: I'd give 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats, and 2 of them are litter-kickers. We even have covered litter boxes, and they manage to track litter all over our wood floors. NOT ANYMORE! These mats are awesome. They work exactly as stated. The holes trap the litter when kitty steps out of the box, and the cleanup is super easy. Once a week I just pick up the mat and dump the loose litter back into the pan. I seriously can't say how great these mats are. I'm no longer hesitant to walk barefoot around the house. **Our cats don't pee outside the litter box, so I don't know about the pads you can buy to go with the mat.
customer_reviews.author: midwestjane

customer_reviews.title: This is ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible! I have 2 cats, 1 is polydactul (double paws) and the litter was uncontrollable..all over the house, the couches, the bed. I was running around like a crazy cat lady with brooms and vacuums. THIS has pretty much solved my problem. My house will never be perfect again, but this made it 95% more bearable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marcotte-Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I actually just ordered another one of these for my downstairs litter box. I ordered one for my upstairs litter box & it worked great. One of my cats was peeing just outside of the litter box on the rug. I kept cleaning it & she would still go there instead of inside. I used a whole bottle of cat urine cleaner & then put this over the area she was peeing. I put piddle pads inside in case she pees there again. So far she has been great, so I just ordered another one. A little pricey, but it is very large, well constructed & well worth it in my opinion. Will update if I run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dzwieleski

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in the way this works
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful that this would solve the problem of constant sweeping. I'm disappointed in the way this works. Because it has 3 sides open and bends easily, it is very easy to dump the litter all over while trying to empty it. My cat avoids stepping on the mat, so most of the litter is still all over the floor. He doesn't like the feel of it on his paws, which defeats the entire purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Brown eyes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Have a Cat/Pet, but Works Great, Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a cat, but I needed something exactly like this for another reason. It works wonderfully when you used with an absorbant pad and makes my life easier and less stressful. I rinse it off occasionally to prevent any kind of build up of residue or odor, dry it off with paper towels, then insert an absorbant pad to get any moisture left on the perforated side and for the moisture it catches when used for what I intend it for.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Best litter mats ever,
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and 5 litter boxes and one of my cats in particular is an extremely enthusiastic digger lol. I have tried a number of litter mats in the past but still had to constantly clean litter from the surrounding area plus was less than pleased to find it tracked far and wide as well. I purchased 2 of these to try and am very pleased with their performance! They are sturdy (the excavator continues his covering up operations once he’s left the box, hence the short-lived existence of previous mats), capture probably 90% of what they track out on their feet, and are incredibly easy to clean. I’m definitely ordering more for the remaining boxes,,
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chenoweth

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye To Litter On Floor
customer_reviews.text: This litter trapping mat has SIGNIFICANTLY decreased litter that my cat tracks when he exits litter box. I am impressed and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James M Trent Jr.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a litter box this is a MUST OWN item!
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect (nothing will be) however it's as close to perfection as you can buy. I've tried a couple other different designed litter mats hoping to stop having to step on litter but until I bought this my efforts were futile. I won't say I haven't stepped on a single piece of litter but I'm doing so MUCH less frequently and this is while not sweeping the floor around it multiple times a day anymore. Between not having to sweep constantly and not stepping on litter nearly as much this thing is worth it's weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for litter control
customer_reviews.text: So far, this may has been a total game changer with litter control in the house. I have a litter box in my closet that 3 cats use and litter tracking use to be a daily struggle. I have a pet peeve about feeling anything under my bare feet and use to sweep up litter at least twice a day if not more. With this new mat, I have yet to pick up my broom to sweep litter up and I have been using it for almost 4 days now!! I think it is worth the price for the quality you receive. I also love that this is a USA based company!
customer_reviews.author: StephMc

customer_reviews.title: Top layer lifting feature is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased one of these when they first were introduced. The top layer lifting feature is GREAT. This allows us to lift and sweep the collected litter instead of having to break out the vacuum when it is time to clean. It is also thick enough that when you are by the box cleaning, loose litter does not get stuck to your shoes or knees. If you are not sure on how big to go, I would recommend the larger size as my cats are slobs around the box. We use this one for the mud room box and purchased to jumbos for the other two boxes that are near carpeted areas.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Berry

customer_reviews.title: "Saves me energy"
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the merchandise I received. Since this mat has been in use I have been sweeping less to nearly not at all picking up her scattered litter around the house. The material could be better, to me it feels somewhat faux rubber/foam texture. I think it could've been better just being more rubberised. Also once open there's a paper that speaks about the product saying: there has been no report stating that cats use the mat as a scratching post. Well let me be the first to say that my cat at times do use it as a scratching post. I believe the material lure them to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Narcyzse Wylyé

customer_reviews.title: many don't get into this works great, I use newspaper
customer_reviews.text: this is very large ,it works well with the large litter pan(purschase on here),goes end to end ,I bought thiis as beinging a foster mom for cats and kittens,many don't get into this works great,I use newspaper,or puppy pads. Our older cat almost 20,misses the pan at times,this works great. does also collect the litter,so this is the only draw back if he misses,it mixes with the litter and becomes wet,and does collect, But all in all,I rather clean the trapper,then my floor.I would tell my other fosters ,this is great,any size cat,even if you have a small dog that uses the litter pan go for it,easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: penelope

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant design
customer_reviews.text: My cat's jump out of the L-box and land on THIS! I have a tall litter box with a hole in the top. The cat's could dart to the left or right but they seem to like landing their paws on this mat. So most everything lands on the mat and tumbles onto the catcher below. What a time saver! My tiles are so much easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I use one of the newer litters. It is like sand, works very well but my cats were tracking it out of the box and all around the area. I was ready to change litters, but someone recommended this mat. It is the best thing to come along since litter. No more tracking all over my house. I don't have to sweep up the litter. I just very easily pick up the mat and empty it.
customer_reviews.author: gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. This mat does an OK job of catching the litter, but it is a pain to clean if one of the cat's decides to pee on it. The litter that was trapped gets clumped up underneath and also gets stuck in little holes of the top layer. It takes way too long to clean the clumped litter out of each hole. I don't think the mat is really worth the price, due to the aggravation of having to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Yissa

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to keep the litter off but
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to keep the litter off but the kitty loves to eat it too :). I read some reviewers had said that the cats wouldn't want to walk on it. At first my kitty hesitated too, but then he is very OK with it and he loves to pick on it with his teeth and claws. I wish he wouldn't do it, because he already damaged the grading.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Platonova

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Prevents wasted litter.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent mats. They do a great job of trapping Litter. Litter falls into the little holes and you can easily just dump it back into the litter box. Not only does it stop litter from getting on to the carpet, it saves the litter from being wasted! My cat also likes to claw it so it serves double duty. It seems durable enough to withstand the clawing without a problem. I bought one of these and one other kind of litter mat. I ended up ordering two more of these ones. I'd definitely recommend it. That said, I do wish it was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Agostini

customer_reviews.title: It works--I see no litter residue on the floor
customer_reviews.text: It's working very well. I see no litter residue on the floor and the mat is large. My litter box is actually a cut tupperware container which is very large (one of the sides cut lower so the cats can climb in easy but the rest is left intact so cats can't kick litter out on the sides). I use SLIDE clumping litter.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Pleasent surprise on a heavily sponsored review item.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is flooded with sponsored review litter mats and this is no exception. Rolled the dice but 90% of the time sponsored review items are garbage. Not the case here. 2 months only a few pieces of litter tracked away from the box and only because I have to use the short side. If i could set it up with the long side I dont think it would miss any. I dont mess with pulling it up just suck the litter out with a vacuum. Now if amazon would just get rid of sponsored reviews so products could be compared better...
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Kitty Clean Up
customer_reviews.text: This works just like the video shows. It really traps a lot of cat litter which is fabulous because nobody likes to step on that stuff. It came in a large flat cardboard case which kept it flat so that it is ready to lay flat immediately.I wish it was just a little longer as it fits in a hallway on top of carpet and I would like to have a little more room for kitty to clean paws before lift-off. It really is the best thing I have come across yet for cat mess. Haven't had it long enough to know how it cleans up.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Mat
customer_reviews.text: I use a larger chunky natural litter and the holes catch them much better than any other mat I've used. Washing is a bit difficult because it's so big, but the pros outweigh the cons. I put a urine pad in between the layers. The first time I didn't I picked it up and pee ran down on my foot and to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We just recently adopted two BIG 7.5 month old kittens from the shelter. We had a 17.5 year old cat prior to that as well as a 15 year old cat. We had the hardest time keeping the litter tracking down in our house. This mat has worked the very best of any mat we've ever used. While we've noticed some tracking, it's markedly less than before. I like being able to take it outside to shake out the litter which accumulates in the honeycomb design. We liked the first one so much that we ordered a second one! Now, if the Color offering could be something more than black, that would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeRunningCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Works, but easy to make a mess witt
customer_reviews.text: Because the mat opens up full leaving three sides unsealed, it's so easy to pick up this mat and have all the picked up litter spill out everywhere. While the holes in the mat are big and easy can hold a lot of litter, it's not actually grabbing the litter off my cats' paws. Maybe I'm using too fine of litter and this isn't a common issue, but I still see litter trailing off beyond the mat. I'm just disappointed because I expected it all to be caught by the time the cats reached the end of the mat. For the price, I'm not as thrilled as I expected to be.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Risso

customer_reviews.title: Could work a little better
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as well as I’d hoped. The cats still seem to get litter everywhere around their box. I don’t know if a larger pad would work better. One cat has decided that his is an extension of the little box and craps in holes as if he’s playing checkers.
customer_reviews.author: Yagi D.

customer_reviews.title: No more litter tracking.  Genius design!
customer_reviews.text: What a clever idea. I put this in front of my cat's box and it solved the litter tracking problem completely. To clean out the trapped litter, separate the top section (with the holes) from the bottom section, and empty the litter into a waste container. SO easy and my cat doesn't even seem to notice it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Davis

customer_reviews.title: worth the price, works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or four brand of litter mat, and it clearly works the best. My wallet groans every time I shell out $25 for it, but I now own three. When I have more $$$ I’ll probably use it at the front and back foot for humans so dirt doesn’t track on the wood floors. Collects 95% of the litter, which is my better than my old 70% success rate. Also it’s cushy memory foam feels much better of my feet in socks than the old spiky plastic ones I still have until I can afford a ton of these lol.
customer_reviews.author: soccerstar666

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We recently decided to move the litterboxes into a more commonplace in our house and tracked litter was a big problem. Since using this product we have far fewer issues with tracked litter. Instead of 100% mess, there may be a stray piece to sweep up maybe once a day or every other day. I would recommend this product. It's easy to get the tracked litter out and helps so much.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My cat's litter box is in the bathroom. The sides curve in to minimize litter flying everywhere but it didn't seem to be helping. Only a day after vacuuming the bathroom floor was strewn with litter...which quickly dispersed throughout the entire apartment, borne on soft little cat feet (and people feet too). Short of vacuuming twice a day, nothing worked! Since getting the mat there has been a significant reduction in rogue litter bits!! Mat placement is crucial though -- watch your cat and note where he exits the litter box. That's where you want to have more of the mat surface area. Clean up is simple: I take it outside and shake it over the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Harder to clean than a regular litter box mat. Does not cut down on tracking litter.
customer_reviews.text: It's a mess to clean because the litter stays on top AND falls through the holes. It's a stiff mat, so it's cumbersome to dump the litter without making a mess. You have to separate the top and bottom to clean it . I went back to a regular litter box mat that is easier to clean. It didn't cut down on litter tracking either. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Some have noted that when you pick it up the litter falls out the side. I have not been able to recreate that issue....I know I am picking up a mat with litter trapped in there so I fold the edges up a bit. Doesn't seem like an issue to me at all. Cats are okay with the mat too....they normally are touchy about materials to step on outside of the litter box but they don't have an issue with this material. Material doesn't smell plastic-y either which I appreciate. Best part of this product is that it is MADE IN THE USA!!! Thanks for a well-thought out product. Will be buying another. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BJGW

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Really catches all the litter. My cat jumps out of her box and sprays litter everywhere. I was tired of sweeping several times a day and still feeling litter under my feet. This mat has stopped at least 97% Of the litter from getting on the floor. This product has saved me time and the annoyance of litter covered floor.
customer_reviews.author: Erin100

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for cats who just throw litter
customer_reviews.text: This might be an unfair review because the product isn't to blame. We tried to use this to protect our floor in front of our litter box and my cats decided it was the place to pee INSTEAD of the litter box. It does hold some liquid but when you try to move it out to clean it it's a mess waiting to happen. Probably good for cats who just throw litter, not awesome for jerk cats who like to pee outside their box.
customer_reviews.author: kaeldra1

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cats that speed out of the litter box as if their lives depended on it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Catches all stray litter and the holes are deep enough that litter doesn't get stuck to feet. Easy to fold and split open to empty contents into trash. Easy to wash. I havd no problems with liquid getting onto it but you can easily put an absorbant mat in between it. It itself doesn't absorb liquids.
customer_reviews.author: sarah jean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! It does such a good job of catching the litter. I have two cats with two boxes side by side. I put the mat right in front of the boxes and the mat has been catching almost all the litter. There is always going to be a few pieces that get caught in their paws but this has made a huge improvement. Also it's very easy to clean up. Just pick up the mat, open the one side and shake over the box. Did I mention I love this mat.
customer_reviews.author: LCJ

customer_reviews.title: Catches litter, Easier to clean than others.
customer_reviews.text: Catches most of the litter. Fairly easy to sweep or vacuum most of it, but a little difficult to get around the edges or in the seam without knocking litter on the floor. My cat doesn't track anything wet so I can't judge absorbency. Overall, it is so much better than anything else I've tried, I give 5 stars and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri C

customer_reviews.title: Not to impressed
customer_reviews.text: It does hold the litter, however not much different than the regular mat I had. The only "nice" thing is when she gets "pissy" and hangs over the side of the box (and yes her box is completely cleaned) it keeps the urine off the floor and holds it in the mat. Maybe works better for clumping litter, but not the crystals.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyLeigh Walker

customer_reviews.title: If you have a messy cat this mat is for you.
customer_reviews.text: This may is exactly as described. It doesn't slide around on wood or tile floors. I thought it may arrive with a fresh plastic/chemical smell but it didn't. I'm very sensitive to smells so that's a big benefit. So far it's worked good for my 2 dirty cats. I'm using a basic store bought non natural litter. Without this mat that litter was spread everywhere through my house. Easy to clean and hold more than enough litter. I've tried a few other mats on the market but non collect as much debris. The only drawback I can think of is that I don't think black goes with everyone's decor. A few more color options would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Turbeau

customer_reviews.title: A really awesome cat liter mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It really works.We have 4 adult cats and 2 kittens and they can really make a liter mess when getting out of their box. Easy to clean and keeps liter off the floor. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Riling

customer_reviews.title: Get more than what your are buying
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing product with more than an obvious use. Yes, it is the best litter catching mat we have ever used and as cat owners for 30 years we've used them all. This does a terrific job with no surrounding mass and no grit if we walk on it. This is so cool we can even use it as a bath mat since it is soft and comfortable under foot and traps water. We use this on the inside and outside litter box and love it
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats never peed on the floor until this thing! It is NOT waterproof. Picked it up to empty the litter out and the bottom was dripping, what a mess. Don't waste your money!! If I felt like cleaning it I would send it back, but that's not going to happen. Total waste!
customer_reviews.author: chris curtis

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple weeks of usage, my cat has managed to make it fall apart. Making a product for a cat should be made of a more durable material to withstand cat claws would be ideal. It falls apart too easily and my cat. For the price, it is a waste of money. Threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Loop

customer_reviews.title: does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says it does. No mat will ever catch 100% of litter but it does reduce it dramatically. I use it with a cat genie machine. My only complaint, and it's not even really a complaint, is that it could be a smidge more flexible. It'd be easier to empty back into the machine. I've already had to clean a cat mess from it and it was super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MelH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I love this! It has seriously cut down litter tracking by 75-90% depending on the cat using the box at the time. I have a walker and a jumper....the jumper leaves litter no matter what mat I use but it has been markedly decreased with the use of this mat. With the other cat I can't even tell if she's been in the room where the litter box is. I kinda wish they had a bigger one....or I might just get another one or two so the jumper can't avoid them. This is worth every single penny I spent since now I don't have to sweep the floor 5-6 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: plfreitag

customer_reviews.title: Slips and falls out
customer_reviews.text: While it does trap cat litter pretty well, the fact that the mat slides around non-carpet floors really bothers me. Whenever the cats jump out of their litterbox, it slides against their weight. Eventually, it ends up on the other side of the room, becoming absolutely useless. I wish I could get a refund. This was a pretty expensive mat that's really served no purpose. The sides also dont clasp close, so the litter it catches falls out very easily. I would not recommend this to any cat owner out there.
customer_reviews.author: joodee

customer_reviews.title: I’m really glad I decided to purchase this litter mat
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I decided to purchase this litter mat! It has definitely saved me a lot of time cleaning up litter. I sit the litter box a few inches on top of mat since my cat always seems to toss out litter while digging for the perfect spot to go & it was driving me crazy to always find a pile of litter right outside of litter box. With this it gets trapped so I can dump it right back into box or throw out. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: hope delgado

customer_reviews.title: No more mess
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but once you flatten the mat out (it comes in a roll), it really does catch everything. Of course it will always depend on how much your cat jumps out of the litter box, but we have one of those kitty litter igloo things. Our cat walks out the little door and straight onto the mat. It’s a little hard to manage cleaning it out (I’ve spilled a bunch) because when you open it, the litter slides right off so you need to be careful. Otherwise, it’s just great! Keeps the area clean and I don’t have to vacuum as much. :D
customer_reviews.author: Robin Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works for Ökocat
customer_reviews.text: We use Ökocat, so finding a litter mat was a little tricky. Ökocat does track a LOT. We had pieces of litter everywhere in the house (gross). We now only get a few pieces of litter on the floor outside where we keep the litter box. The mat is very easy to clean. It is also quite large, and doesn't seem to hold any scents.
customer_reviews.author: Reycol

customer_reviews.title: Keeps area clean and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.text: How did I not have one of these before? In a small apartment it is hard to keep the litter box hidden and then even harder to keep the area around it clean. So thankful I found this. Still can see the trapped litter but at least it’s contained
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful solution for kittie problems
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for...traps the litter left on the paws and also collects the urine should your cat decide to pee outside the box... To get rid of the litter on the surface, I just shake the mat outside or back into the box; to get rid of the urine in the bottom layer of the mat, I carefully pick the mat and carefully dispose of the urine and then give the mat a good wash to get rid of the odor and prevent further "accidents". The mat dries quite quickly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for a Cat Genie Owner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based soley on a review posted here about another person using it for their cat genie. I was tired of getting granules all over the house. I bought one, it worked wonders by putting it in front of the cat genie. I soon bought another. It reduced the tracking downstairs and all over the house by 95%. I was using several other types of mats prior. This works great. I have two cats. One runs out of the box like he is on fire and sprays the granules all over. I had to have something that the granules were trapped into and then the cats would not re step on them to track.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCoskey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter mat
customer_reviews.text: I have tried just about every cat litter mat out there. They all fail to catch any meaningful amount of litter, thus it still ends up all over the house. This is the first mat that eliminates most of the scatter. The litter is easily caught and falls into the holes. You can then empty that litter back into the litter box. I estimate it eliminates about 85 percent of the scatter. Depending on your cat and whether or not they are a fluffy will determine how much litter makes it past the mat. It can be easily cleaned as well. The only CON I can think of is the cost. Still though we are going to order two more.
customer_reviews.author: Trebor

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I had little rugs before and it just made a mess this has helped with litter big time. I have little wall screens I use it make the cats take the long way out so they stay on the mat as long as possible to rid their paws of litter before heading onto floors.
customer_reviews.author: jbk

customer_reviews.title: Mat is ok
customer_reviews.text: So far its ok. It does catch some litter, but not enough. I wish the mat was even larger or that it came one foot strips. If you put the litter box on top of the mat, then not much is available for catching litter. If you put the mat in front of the box, then the side has no protection. Strips that are 12 -14 inches by 24 would solve the problem. You can put a strip on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Terralynn Lake

customer_reviews.title: Cat mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the packaging, it arrived flat in a large box. After a week of use I’m very happy with the product. I would say it’s captures about 90% of the litter. After reading some reviews abour cats not liking the texture and not wanting to walk on it I was a little skeptical. Good thing my cats are both ok with it :) I recommend and will probably buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Practical and it works.
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES to kick liter out of her box and then spread it across the floor when she walks about. I got this in hopes that it would help contain the liter. I've had it for a week now and it is doing it's job well. It is a little bit ugly, but at the same time I really don't know how one could pretty it up and keep it functional. The only reason that it "bothers me" (and I use that lightly) is because it is in my master bathroom and it clashes with my decor. I look forward to less liter about the house with this little baby hangin out under her box.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Best litter mat ever
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this mat to any cat parent. I’ve tried in vain for years to switch my stubborn brats to a litter that tracks less but they refuse. I have tried literally every other mag on the market. I hesitated on buying this one because the price was slightly higher and I didn’t want to waste my money on another dud but this has been a lifesaver. I longer have to sweep or vacuum everyday by the litter. While some stubborn litter does still stick to their paws this mat grabs the majority of it. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Karina Karina

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Maybe too well...
customer_reviews.text: This mat does a great job trapping litter and I noticed an immediate reduction in the amount of litter being scattered around the house. Unfortunately I had to stop using it because the trapped litter was confusing the cats and they were using the bathroom on it. After cleaning the mat, the cats would go back to using their litter box. However, this cycle was repeating too often (even with only a small amount of litter being trapped) so I decided to remove the mat and just continue sweeping the scattered litter. I'm still giving 4 stars because the mat is good quality and very effective... just not usable for my scenario.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: EZ Clean, oh how I love thee!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, buy this! I have tried numerous cat litter mats in an effort to find THE ONE that will catch the most litter and also look nice. This is it! Look no further. I have 4 corner cat litter boxes for my 3 cats. I'll be buying one of these for each litter box. My 2nd mat is on the way and I can't wait to get it! The litter falls through the holes to a bottom mat. I don't have to see the litter as it collects, and...AND my cats don't track the litter to other parts of the house. Yes, it's pricey, but heck, it works. VERY easy to clean. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat exceeded my expectations! We have a small house, so the litter box is in the bathroom by our bath tub. I was getting irritated stepping on tracked litter getting out of the bath. This mat has eliminated that problem. The litter does fall into the holes...you don't feel it or track it, even if your feet are wet. So far, the mat has been easy to clean and durable...thinking I will be buying another mat for basement litter box soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This does really help keep the litter in the pad. I was expecting a bit of an edge underneath but it's completely flat. Cats took a look at it and ignored it after that. So worth it to not crunch litter under my shoe while walking across the tile floor. Also makes it easier to scoop the litterbox since I don't worry about it getting on the floor. Was bigger than I expected but I didnt check dimensions. Perfect for what I need in a 4 cat household.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie K

customer_reviews.title: Kitty household must!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! My oldest kitty had started peeing outside the litter box enclosure. Thankful it wasn't on the floor since I have everything sitting on an office mat to protect the floor but the mess and clean up was awful. This mat makes it easier as I place a non scented puppy pad in it. I've also noticed a reduction in litter tracking. Only drawback was when my eldest threw up on the mat; it clogged the holes. 😳 Small price to pay. Overall, very satisfied and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: So good I got a second one! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must in front of litter boxes. Especially if your cats are flingers or decide to dash out of their boxes with the litter still stuck in their paws. Saves me from walking all over stray little pebbles and easy to clean. Does not hold smell or stain. Cats even barfed on it and I still found it easy to clean. A little big for a regular sink, but wouldn't trade it for the world.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: I have two cats that love to fling litter as far as they can
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that love to fling litter as far as they can, and I was skepticle after seeing Facebook ads and such but this one was a better deal than ones I'd seen on Facebook so I decided to give it a shot. I am HOOKED! This has decreased my litter pick up by a good 75%. I've used a lot of mats that were supposed to prevent litter tracking but this is by far the best. It makes my litter life much easier 10/10 would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my cat to tinkle on!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was being a jerk and peeing outside the litter box. After I took her to the vet to find out there was nothing wrong with her, I bought this along with puppy training pads. She now pees on the mat without fail (I think she doesnt like litter touching her butt) and all i do is change out the training pads. No messes and the pads absorb the smell so there is also no smell. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tkay94

customer_reviews.title: Scattered litter
customer_reviews.text: Got this mat and I was excited to see my porch floor free of litter the morning after. However, there was more scattered litter than before. Went back to using the kind that looks like tangled fibers/lines laying flat. I saw one of the holes in this mat very filled with litter, so I guess the excess is easily kicked off and scattered. The material is very much foam like which gets indentations if pressed. I am surprised as others have said, that this mat has such great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy75

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing invention! I had my kitty's litter box on a deck outside my bedroom. The kitty litter was all over the deck complete with packed dust that would not come up. I haven't had any problems since I bought this. I even repainted my deck and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rosini

customer_reviews.title: GREAT litter mat!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful litter mat! Super easy to clean and empty out the collected litter. We were having a horrible issue with the cats tracking litter out of the box. This solved it. No more crunchy feet in the laundry room and no more tracking nasty litter through out the house. One of the cats pooped on it and I just took it outside and sprayed it down with the garden hose. Wiped it down with a towel after cleaning and waved it out to further dry. Super fast and easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lovendestroy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I thought this litter mat was going to be much more effective. It works some...it traps some litter. But there’s still litter on the floor beside the mat...thus litter is still spreading around my house to be stepped in and for my toddler to pick up. I will say, it’s at least a little better than it was before I got this mat, but it doesn’t work nearly as well as I thought it would based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. A Iittle pricy
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. A Iittle pricy, but much more efficient then my other one. The large one is pretty big, but somehow my guys keep jumping off to the side of mat (this is nothing new, so not a mat issue, but a cat issue). The lady kitty steps and walks well on the mat, so my guys are just bonkers. I think it is something like how human boys can't keep it in the bowl.. anywho- great mat and easy to use, I like the flip top instead of the one open side, easy to manage and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th litter trapper by iprimio and I love it. I use all 4 to cover the floor of the room that I keep the litter boxes in, and they are great at trapping litter and preventing it from being tracked into other rooms. I have 3 cats so these are sorely needed. I also put wee wee pads inside the litter trappers in case the cats have accidents (which unfortunately, they often do). The mats & wee wee pad liners prevent urine from getting onto the floor, and the litter from getting tracked into other parts of the house. Love these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product! My cat would always scratch the rugs into a ball after coming out of the cat box and I'd constantly have straighten them out. She still does her scratching but this pad is heavy enough that she can't get it balled up and strong enough that she can't tear it up. . She doesn't track nearly as much litter out of the bathroom floor either. I think walking on this pad with the holes on top, naturally spreads her toes apart so most of what's on her feet stays in the mat. If any of her "business" gets on this, I can hose or wash it off very easily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: dmcrane

customer_reviews.title: Cat Litter Trapper Traps It
customer_reviews.text: This mat works splendidly. So excited about it, as it make my life easier! Traps the litter and keeps it out of site, it's well made, and opens easily to clean. I was using pet pads in-between, but they weren't the exact size and it's easier to just wipe it down. The size works great for being under the box and extends to the sides and somewhat infront, but I am using another cat mat for when they walk out. Would like to see a smaller sized mat that I could use along with the big one, in different color options, that'd be really deluxe. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer99999

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We are a multi-cat household & work really hard to ensure no one will ever know it by cat odor. This mat is ideal in helping us accomplish that! I was shocked to learn that our cats began urinating outside the liter box in the liter tracked from the box! After purchasing this mat, that problem is solved. Excess liter is easy to see on the black material. The 3 sided openings makes shaking it out easy, and the waterproof base material will ensure no soaking mistakes! Excellent product with a plus - USA made! Update: We just bought 2 more, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: JWS

product_meta.title: iPrimio Large Cat Litter Trapper Mat Exclusive Urine/Waterproof Layer. Larger Holes Urine Puppy Pad Option Messy Cats. Soft on Paws Light
feature_bullets: Traps litter from cats paws and litter from box. Litter falls through extra large holes (larger than competition).
We manufactured into our TRAPPER MAT an EXCLUSIVE PLASTIC FILM. It repels urine - other mats "CLAIM" this, but they DON'T. Patent Pending.

Super light. Black Color. For Really Messy Cats be sure to use Puppy Pads as they soak excessive urine - avoid urine around nylon mesh located on perimeter of the mat. This outside nylon border may absorb urine if excessive.
Super smooth surface - doesn't bother cat paws like other mats. XL Size 30 Inches Long. 23 Inches Wide

EZ Open Edge allows for easy cleaning under sink head, shower head, or shake off. Size is 30 inches by 23 inches. There is NOW a JUMBO VERSION available search JUMBO Cat Litter Trapper and SMALL version.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
